name: Dungeon Deckers!
description:
Welcome To Your New Dungeon!

Congrats! Now you just have to deal with the adventurers... Build up your deck of traps and treasures to take them out. Will you outlive this raiding party? Let's find out!

What Is Dungeon Deckers?

Dungeon Deckers is a solo deck-building game. The aim is to get the most victory points before 20 rounds (The party has been exhausted) or until you run out of lives (You have been overrun!).

How To Play

The game is played over several rounds. Each round has 4 phases:

Start of Round

A new adventurer enters your dungeon and you draw a fresh hand of 5 cards. Hover over an adventurer to see their current health and their max health.

Attack Phase

Use trap cards from your hand to wound adventurers. Killing adventurers earns you a lot of victory points! Trap cards can also have other effects to help you.

Upgrade Phase

Play treasure cards in your hand to gain gold. Spend gold to buy better cards from the shop for your deck! Remember, gold only lasts for the current upgrade phase.

End of Round

All adventurers advance into your dungeon. If any make it past the final zone, you lose a life! You also gain a Wizard card. This does nothing but clog up your deck (Pesky wizards!)

You also discard any remaining cards in your hand.

End Of The Game

The game ends after 20 rounds or after you lose all your lives. Your final score is your VP's + the cost of all cards in your deck. Try to get the highest score you can!
